description.value:
Adds multiple members, up to 1000 per call, to a mailing list, using JSON array format.
If the request includes more than 100 entries, the mailing list will be updated asynchronously.
description.display_value:
Adds multiple members, up to 1000 per call, to a mailing list, using JSON array format.
If the request includes more than 100 entries, the mailing list will be updated asynchronously.
